name: Dyztopia
description:
Dyztopia is a game made in RPG Maker MV. It is a cute, but difficult RPG.  Play in a post-human world where the bad guy is your boss. Meet exciting people like Robun, and explore the maps to your heart's content!

Don't forget your Body Armor!
NOTE: This game is in development! It is unfinished! But you can play until the end of Chapter 1.  Please PM me any bugs or typos and I'll release a hotfix. Have fun with the game!

Special Thanks to
